department: Office of the Auditor General of Canada
description: The Office of the Auditor General of Canada (OAG) requires the services of a Contractor to provide intermediate leadership development consultants to prepare the delivery of the seven (7) module Leadership Blueprint training sessions, which includes adapting some of the material for the employee audience, facilitating each of the seven (7) modules sessions for the entire Office and creating evaluation questions for each of the seven (7) modules.
full_summary:
# Leadership Development Consultant

**Bid Invitation**

The Office of the Auditor General of Canada (OAG) publishes a request for proposal (RFP) for the provision of leadership development consultant services.

**Procurement Details**

* Contract reference number: cb-5782-41445372
* Solicitation number: 384/B
* Amendment number: 1
* Publication date: May 23, 2023
* Tender closing date and time: June 7, 2023, 2:00 PM
* Amendment date: June 7, 2023
* Expected contract start and end dates: None

**Services Required**

The OAG requires the services of a contractor to provide intermediate leadership development consultants to:

* Adapt training material for employee audience
* Facilitate seven module sessions for the entire Office
* Create evaluation questions for each module

**Technical and Business Requirements**

The solicitation method employed is competitive and selective. Bidders must submit a combined ranked assessment of technical merit and price as the basis of selection.

**Regional Requirements**

The procurement is open to bidders across the following regions:

* National Capital Region (NCR)
* Ottawa
* Canada
* Gatineau

**Trade Agreements**

The procurement is subject to the following trade agreements:

* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)

**Documents and Contact Information**

A detailed tender notice and procurement documents are available on the [Canada Buy Service][canadabuy] portal. 

* Language of documents: English and French
* Access: [English documents][1] | [French documents][2]
* Contact person: Michel Daoud  [mailto:suppliers@oag-bvg.gc.ca](mailto:suppliers@oag-bvg.gc.ca) | (613) 952-0213

[1]: <https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/5782/rfp_384
